General.Name: Beijing New Building Materials Public Ltd Co
General.Description: Beijing New Building Materials Public Limited Company manufactures and sells building materials in China and internationally. The company operates in Lightweight Building Materials and Waterproof Building Materials segments. It provides gypsum, multifunctional, mineral wool, and fiber cement boards; light steel and T-grid studs; paintings; joint compound gypsum, binder, leveling putty, self-leveling gypsum, and putty powders; insulating materials, such as rock wool board and felt, and granulated wool; waterproof materials; floorings; and ceiling and partition accessories, and special tools. The company also offers interior, exterior wall, and ceiling systems. Its products are used in home decorations, office buildings, hotels, guesthouses, stadiums, subway tunnels, industrial plants, residential buildings, and other commercial and public buildings. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Building A, Beixin Center, Beijing, China, 102209
